author: bencomic

right.text: although it might be a bit hard to find new material now

left.text: hope you're still churning out the somewhat less than flattering cameo games

right.text: you're now reduced to spying on a network I helped found. (And, if it was my network alone, I'd have glined you before you could say "oops". But it's not my decision)

left.text: since, well,  instead of an entire community to share stories of "oh, nima did this" and "lol nima did that", as well as an entire forum just waiting for me to post stupid stuff on

title: I TRIED SO HARD, AND GOT SO FAR
